text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Hello, everyone. 
Thank you for supporting Team <Ascella> throughout spring.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: To Rhein Kraft and Cesario, who both obtained G1 victories――Cheers!

text_block_list.name: Kraft&Cesario
text_block_list.text: Cheersー!!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Cesario, it's like a dream come true, isn't it? 
To think they'd hold such a big party.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Let's run together in the fall too! 
At the 『Shuuka Sho』!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, let's do that, Kraft! 
At that time, we'll be rivals again.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Yeah! I'll show you what I can do on that stage! The 『Oka Sho』 
『NHK Mile C』, and then I'll win the 『Shuuka Sho』――

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
The "Unorthodox Triple Crown"! 
I'll break open a new route to the Tiara!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Unorthodox……Triple Crown……

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
(I see. Kraft's path doesn't end with just two wins. 
She's already looking ahead, to a new Unorthodox Triple Crown……)

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Uaaaah!! 
Unorthodox Triple Crown! Are you serious, Kraft!?

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Hyaa!? Ah……Vodka-san!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Oh man, even though I haven't even debuted yet…… 
As expected of Kraft～!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
An Unorthodox Double Crown is already cool enough, but an 
Unorthodox Triple Crown too!? That's what I'd call Champ-class!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Uooooooooh, I wanna do something amazing like that too-!! 
Maybe I'll go get some advice from Gim-senpai!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, yeah, we'll work hard so that 
Vodka-san will want to work hard too!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Right, Cesario?

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Y-yeah……

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
(Kraft is already moving on towards an Unorthodox Triple 
Crown. But then, what should I do? Of course, the 『Shuuka 
Sho』 is a race that I've always dreamed of winning, but……)

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
(At the 『Shuuka Sho』 is there really anything that…… 
only an Oaks Uma Musume like me can do? I can't 
become a Triple Tiara Uma Musume, after all)

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: ……? What's wrong? You've been staring pretty hard at Cesario.
Nothing, I was just a little worried about her.
Nothing, I was just a little worried about her.

There was something that I had wanted to discuss with Cesario. 
But……

At first, she looked like she was having fun, but then all of 
a sudden she had a complicated look on her face. Why was that?

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
(Fuu……for some reason I feel kind of exhausted…… 
Maybe I just need to get some fresh air……)

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
(………… 
What should I do, from now on……?)
Cesario, so you're out here.
Cesario, so you're out here.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Ah, Trainer……
What's wrong? You look kind of down.
What's wrong? You look kind of down.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
……Actually……there's something I'm worried about. Now that it's 
the end of spring, Kraft's and my paths have split in to two……

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: And now that they've split, I don't know where I should go now……

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Kraft has already chosen to pioneer a new path for 
the Tiara. A new way through the 『NHK Mile C』―― 
achieving the Unorthodox Double Crown.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
And now she's moving on to try for a Triple Crown. 
That truly is a new path for the Tiara.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
On the other hand, having experienced Symboli Kris S' strength, 
I learned. By winning the 『Oaks』, I proved my strength.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
But now, after this, I don't have anything like Kraft's 
Unorthodox Triple Crown that I can aim for. Having lost 
the 『Oka Sho』 I can't become a Triple Tiara Uma Musume……

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Like this, it feels like I won't be able to stand 
beside Kraft anymore…… And right now, the one making 
waves in the Triple Crown rotation is "That Uma Musume".
Triple Crown rotation…… "That Uma Musume", huh……

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: And an undefeated Double Crown Uma Musume is born!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text:
It's been a long time since the last!! And so, in the autumn 
in Kyoto, at the 『Kikka Sho』, another legend may be born!

During the spring, a certain Uma Musume had won the 
『Satsuki Sho』 and 『Japan Derby』. Both were part 
of the Classic Triple Crown, the Tiara's counterpart.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
I want to――leave something behind without losing! 
Unshakable proof, for the sake of the Tiara!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: But……how should I do that?

Cesario seemed lost. 
Maybe now was the time to show her.

I had put that letter in my chest pocket, wondering 
what to do with it. Maybe it was all for this moment――

Cesario, I want you to take a look at this letter. 
Maybe this is the answer you've been seeking.

Cesario, I want you to take a look at this letter. 
Maybe this is the answer you've been seeking.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: ――!? This is……!!
It's an invitation. To――
It's an invitation. To――

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: The 『American Oaks』…… Really……for me……

The 『American Oaks』. A G1 held on the west coast 
of America. It was a big race where Classic class 
Tiara Uma Musume from around the world gathered.

It was unexpected, but still a great honor. 
Apparently, Cesario's run at the 『Oaks』 had 
caught the attention of America's racing association.

Up until now, many Uma Musume from this country 
have challenged overseas G1 races. Seeking the 
Pearl was the first to win a European G1 but……

So far, no Uma Musume had achieved a G1 victory 
on Amercan soil. It was something that even the 
"Emperor" Symboli Rudolf was unable to accomplish.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
It's really……an honor isn't it? If I could win, then it would 
be an accomplishment that would rival Kraft's. However――

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
If I recall, in the 『American Oaks』 last year…… it was a race 
which one of our country's best Uma Musume couldn't win, right?

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Even that 『Genius』 trainer and their Uma 
Musume took on that race and placed 2nd……
Yeah, that's right……
Yeah, that's right……

What Cesario was saying was true. It was a race 
that even the Strongest Duo couldn't win. Does 
she have the strength and will to surpass them……?
I think――it's worth taking on the challenge.
I think――it's worth taking on the challenge.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Worth…… But can I really……?
You aren't alone. We're all with you.
You aren't alone. We're all with you.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Trainer……

I was sure of my words. This wouldn't be just 
Cesario's battle, it was Team <Ascella>'s battle.

There was no way I'd let her face this alone. ――This was something 
that all of us would need to come together to overcome.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Thank you very much, Trainer. 
If you're going to say that much, then by all means!

Even though she was hesitant at first, Cesario decided 
to accept the invitation. And so spring came to an end. 
And, as if to support that determination――

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text:
What's this!? Sweep Tosho! 
Sweep Tosho! It's Sweep Tosho!!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text:
Even though she was ranked the 11th favorite, she's won the 
『Takarazuka Kinen』!! Tiara Uma Musume are strong!!!!!!!!

text_block_list.name: Sweep Tosho
text_block_list.text: Uuuuu~, Legerica Paprika, Radimarihoo!!!!!!

text_block_list.name: Sweep Tosho
text_block_list.text:
How was that!? Did you see that-!? 
There's nothing that's impossible for me♪

The greatest magic had been cast. For the first time in 39 
years, an Uma Musume from the Tiara rotation had won the 
『Takarazuka Kinen』. But it wasn't just a normal victory.

It was a shocking victory where she defeated 
last year's champion, Tap Dance City, and Autumn 
Senior Triple Crown winner, Zenno Rob Roy.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Sweep-san did it!!!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: No way……

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
(Against such strong opponents……she won…… 
Everyone in the Tiara rotation is performing 
miracle after miracle…… In that case……me too!)

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Trainer, I won't hesitate anymore. 
I believe I can do it too, I'll take on that challenge.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
An unprecedented American G1 victory! 
At the 『American Oaks』!!
Yeah, let's make it happen! A great achievement for Japan.
Yeah, let's make it happen! A great achievement for Japan.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: ――Yes!!

Our hearts were set on America. Cesario's toughest 
battle would begin, aiming for a historical feat.
